item.title: Drain covered displaced by School parking, 17th December
item.description:
Good afternoon highways, this drain cover has been damaged by parents parking on the pavement and it now presents a trip hazard. Could somebody just come out and reseat it please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Bedford Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary traffic lights on corner of Prestbury High Street, 17th December
item.description:
Temporary traffic lights - how long are these going to be in place with no evidence of anyone working on the issue. Hole was dug on Saturday 13th December, nobody is sorting the issue. This is causing long queues of traffic at peak times ( >1km in length) and this is encouraging drivers to ignore the restricted entry time signs into the village roads and drive, at pace, around the back roads. Note: the link on your site to traffic.net is not working, so report made instead.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: No work taking place, 16th December
item.description:
The roadworks began last Saturday, allegedly a telecomms emergency. Since then I have seen NO WORKING at all. There is a hole in the road, temporary traffic lights and that's it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
